AUDIT_LOGS.LOADING: Dang tai nhat ky kiem toan
AUDIT_LOGS.DESCRIPTION: Nhat ky kiem toan luu giu ho so cac hoat dong trong tai khoan cua ban, cho phep ban theo doi va kiem toan tai khoan, nhom hoac dich vu.
AUDIT_LOGS.LEARN_MORE: Tim hieu them ve nhat ky kiem toan
AUDIT_LOGS.SEARCH_404: Khong co ket qua nao duoc tim thay
AUDIT_LOGS.SIDEBAR_TXT:
Nhat ky kiem toan

Nhat ky kiem toan la cac ban ghi cho su kien va hanh dong trong he thong Chatwoot.

LIST.404: Khong co nhat ky kiem toan nao trong tai khoan nay.
LIST.TITLE: Quan ly nhat ky kiem toan
LIST.DESC: Nhat ky kiem toan la cac ban ghi cho su kien va hanh dong trong he thong Chatwoot.

API.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Nhat ky kiem toan da duoc tai thanh cong
API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Khong the ket noi voi may chu Woot, vui long thu lai sau
